task: Design and execute a five-day film industry summit in Beverly Hills for 100 global filmmakers and producers. Secure a high-profile venue with access to advanced cinematic technology. Coordinate luxury travel arrangements for attendees arriving from various global hubs. Organize a series of panel discussions featuring renowned directors, a red-carpet opening gala, and a cinephile marketplace showcasing the latest in film tech. Ensure that each event offers real-time interpretation services, and implement a blockchain-based guest credentialing system for event access. Conclude with a bespoke awards ceremony, preparing digitally-enhanced award tokens for each winner.

agents.name: client_agent
agents.role: The top-level client agent that communicates with the user and orchestrates the agents to complete the task.

agents.name: summit_planning_agent
agents.role: Oversees the entire planning and execution of the film industry summit.

agents.name: venue_selection_agent
agents.role: Selects and secures high-profile venues with necessary technology for events.

agents.name: technology_amenities_assessment_agent
agents.role: Evaluates and ensures venues have cutting-edge cinematic technology.

agents.name: cinema_technology_liaison
agents.role: Coordinates with tech providers to integrate cinema innovations at the venue.

agents.name: travel_arrangement_agent
agents.role: Coordinates luxury transportation and travel logistics for summit attendees.

agents.name: luxury_transportation_specialist
agents.role: Specializes in booking and managing high-end travel arrangements.

agents.name: global_ticketing_office
agents.role: Processes travel tickets, ensuring VIP treatment for all guests.

agents.name: vip_guest_handling_unit
agents.role: Handles special requests and requirements of VIP guests.

agents.name: event_scheduling_agent
agents.role: Plans and schedules all summit events and activities.

agents.name: panel_discussion_coordinator
agents.role: Organizes and manages panel discussions with industry leaders.

agents.name: director_invitation_management_agent
agents.role: Handles invitations and manages relationships with celebrity directors.

agents.name: celebrity_liason_agent
agents.role: Maintains direct communication with celebrities attending the summit.

agents.name: security_access_agent
agents.role: Manages secure access for attendees using blockchain-based credentialing.

agents.name: blockchain_credentialing_service
agents.role: Implements blockchain technologies for secure and verifiable event access.

agents.name: digital_verification_team
agents.role: Ensures the integrity and security of digital credentials issued to attendees.

agents.name: gala_event_agent
agents.role: Organizes and executes the red-carpet gala events.

agents.name: red_carpet_arrangement_specialist
agents.role: Plans and coordinates high-profile red carpet appearances.

agents.name: fashion_designer_collaboration_agent
agents.role: Collaborates with designers to provide attendees with custom fashion options.

agents.name: interpretation_service_agent
agents.role: Provides multilingual interpretation services throughout the summit.

agents.name: multilingual_support_team
agents.role: Coordinates a team of interpreters for real-time language translation.

agents.name: on_demand_interpreter_unit
agents.role: Deploys interpreters to various events on demand to facilitate communication.

agents.name: marketplace_organization_agent
agents.role: Facilitates the cinephile marketplace, showcasing film technology.

agents.name: film_tech_exhibitor_management
agents.role: Manages exhibitor participation and logistics for showcasing tech.

agents.name: tech_logistics_support
agents.role: Ensures technical setup and functionality for all exhibitors in the marketplace.

agents.name: awards_ceremony_planning_agent
agents.role: Plans and conducts the summit's award ceremony.

agents.name: digital_awards_and_accolades_agent
agents.role: Designs and creates digitally-enhanced awards for winners.

agents.name: token_creation_specialist
agents.role: Crafts unique digital award tokens using advanced technology.

tools.name: panel_discussion_planning_tool
tools.description: Schedules panel discussions and manages speakers.

topics.description: Topics for discussion at the summit.

desired_speakers.description: List of key speakers to invite.

tools.name: event_credentialing_tool
tools.description: Configures blockchain credentials for secure event access.

access_types.description: Different access levels for the event.
